id: Constellation Brands incoming and outgoing CEOs discuss transition, cannabis and wine
paragraph: Keep Me Logged InJim Cramer hears from Constellation Brands' outgoing CEO Rob Sands and incoming CEO Bill Newlands on the transition, the alcohol giant's business and its stake in cannabis producer Canopy Growth.Got a confidential news tip?
